introduction: Log in to your HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC) online account and send your VAT Return or get help with lost usernames, passwords and account activation codes.
more_information:
To use this service you must have: 

+ a VAT number
+ an HMRC online account - sometimes known as a 'Government Gateway account'

You usually get these when you [register for VAT](/vat-returns/send-your-return "Get a VAT number and or HMRC online account").

*[HMRC]: HM Revenue & Customs
*[VAT]: Value Added Tax
overview: Log in and send your VAT Return online and get help with lost username, password or account activation codes
title: Send your VAT Return online
